alert.note: Alert for Crawford (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 6:57PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Crawford County through 745 PM EDT... At 656 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Guys Mills to 6 miles southwest of Meadville to near Adamsville. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and torrential rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Meadville, Titusville, Harmonsburg, Adamsville, Guys Mills, Atlantic, Pymatuning Central, Cochranton, Conneaut Lake, Jamestown, Hydetown, Blooming Valley, Townville, Conneaut Lakeshore, Geneva and Hartstown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for northwestern Pennsylvania.
